product_name: Rossignol Trixie Jib Skis - Junior Girls' - 2012/2013
long_description: Playful, sassy and tough, the Rossignol Trixie Jib skis are designed for young freestylers. Women-specific construction increases maneuverability and reduces overall weight; Trixie Jib skis are perfect for young ladies looking to take a spin in the terrain park. Wood core creates a light and lively ski with excellent ski-to-snow feel and high durability. Fiberglass laminates create a fun, lively feel in the skis and enhances pop. Rossignol Trixie Jib cap construction strengthens tops and sidewalls. Rounded tip shape is designed specifically for park and pipe transitions and skiing switch, and a shock-absorbent rubber insert enhances durability and reduces impacts. Directional twin-tip profile excels when going forward and lets them land jumps and ride backward. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo.
short_description: Playful, sassy and tough, the Rossignol Trixie Jib skis are designed for young freestylers.
